message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI. 

This paper deals with community question answering (cQA) using deep neural networks (DNNs). The paper focuses on multitask learning, where the DNN is trained to solve three tasks simultaneously. The tasks involve similarity between questions and comments, similarity between questions, and similarity between new questions and comments. The paper uses natural language processing techniques and does not involve any manual feature engineering. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval). The paper also involves machine learning techniques, which makes cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) likely sub-categories. Finally, the paper deals with community question answering, which involves social networks and online communities, making cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) a possible sub-category.
